name: Cargo Cult Protector
description:
-Move with WASD

-Shoot with Left click

-switch weapons' with Brackets "{ and }"

-Complete Rituals with "X" cooldown timer 20 seconds per ritual 

-Gather cargo + allies with "Spacebar"

The object of the game is to complete rituals and gather cargo dropped by the Plane Gods. Gather "loyalty dust" to gain Allies to help in your battle for the island! If you survive the onslaught, you win! 

What is a Cargo Cult?

"A cargo cult is a indigenist millenarian belief system in which adherents perform rituals which they believe will cause a more technologically advanced society to deliver goods."

Use the magic of cargo to defend your island!
